problem_text_cn: 一只因损坏而倾斜的椅子,从背后看到的形状如图所示,其中两组对边的平行关系没有发生变化．若∠1=76°,则∠2的度数是()
problem_text_en: The shape of a chair tilted due to damage as seen from the back is shown in the figure, in which the parallel relationship between the two opposite edges has not changed. If ∠1 = N_0, then the degree of ∠2 is ()
